info.task: navigate backwards to not pressed toggle button
info.title: Navigate backwards to a not pressed toggle button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.
